name: Lions & Tigers...Mini-album
description:
Lions & Tigers and HOLY SHIT WHAT WAS THAT?!! Self-released Mini-album

featuring the tracks:

Lions & Tigers and...
There ae ghosts!
Smile, smile, crocodile
I saw a swan and it had your face
My favourite animal is the white werewolf
I'll be a skeleton before you'll be a skeleton
A swarm of bears with sparrows wings
